1.title: Nerds Do Like Us! Bernie Bregman on Comics 'n Cocktails
1.plot: The founder of Club Cosplay and NerdsLikeUs, Bernie Bregman, chats with the Awkward Duo about whether nerds really do like him, kills a certain Star Trek captain, drinks a custom cocktail, and manages to say every one of the 'bad words' we can't actually put on YouTube. This is not to be missed.

2.title: And the Geekie Goes to Kristen Nedopak Gets Day-Drunk
2.plot: This episode starts off with Anastasia insulting the guest's favorite video game...and it really just gets more awkward from there. In other words, this episode is what this show's all about! Kristen Nedopak, from the Geekie Awards and her very popular YouTube channel, joins Comics 'n Cocktails.

3.title: Marvel at the Geek! Meredith Placko Gets the Awkward Treatment
3.plot: Geek.Com writer and Marvel News Host, Meredith Placko joins the Awkward Duo for Comics 'n Cocktails. Find out why she wasn't as fond of the recent Marvel movies as you'd think - though when she said that, she had been drinking a cocktail for a while.

4.title: This Geek Does Drink: Glynnes Pruett Answers Trivia Questions
4.plot: Fresh off her appearance on SyFy's Geeks Who Drink trivia game show, Glynnes Pruett joins the Awkward Duo to answer some real trivia (prodiced by King Trivia)! But Anastasia and Nathan do make sure she's liquored up first. She also fills them in on the goings on at her Fullerton, CA comic-book shop, The Comic Book Hideout!

5.title: Library Bards on Comics and Cocktails
5.plot: Join Anastasia "darth boobs" washington and Nathan "angry baby" as we chat with one of our favorite parody duos Xander Jeanneret and Bonnie Gordon of the library bards.

6.title: An Awkwardly Chubby Bunny on Comics 'n Cocktails
6.plot: Ah... the high-society world of fashion! Vogue, Cartier, Armani, and Chubby Bunny?!? Turns out Chubby Bunny is a nerd-girl, who models, cosplays, and designs geek accessories. She gets the drunk awkward treatment, when she joins Nathan and Anastasia from Awkward Conversations on Comics 'n Cocktails. The awkwardest duo around, from Awkward Conversations on Nerd Reactor, bring you Comics 'n Cocktails! Drinking booze and chatting about comic-books, superheroes, sci-fi, games, cult films, fantasy stories, magic, Star Wars, technology, Star Trek, cosplaying...and did we ...

7.title: Comics 'n Cocktails Gets Annexed Into the Langdon Nation
7.plot: Langdon Bosarge, a fabulous geek, comedian, radio host, and shitsu poodle whisperer, joins the Awkward Gang for Comics 'n Cocktails. He's the King of champagne day-drinking, and he graces us mere mortals with his bubbly personality.

imdb.plot outline: The awkwardest duo around, from Awkward Conversations on Nerd Reactor, bring you Comics 'n Cocktails! Drinking booze and chatting about comic-books, superheroes, sci-fi, games, cult films, fantasy stories, magic, Star Wars, technology, Star Trek, cosplaying...and did we mention drinking booze? Anastasia 'Darth Boobs' Washington and Nathan 'Angry Baby' Lichtman sit down with nerdy guests and ask them the awkward questions you always wanted to... and did we mention there's drinking?
